amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate with respect to the status of private pension plans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2264 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2264 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Nickles to Amendment SA 2233. (consideration: CR S274-275; text: CR S275) To express the sense of the Senate with respect to the status of private pension plans.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2264 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Nickles to Amendment SA 2233.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2264 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
